title: Error: decode rlp of pending txs: EOF
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.02.4-beta`

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash :  tag `v2022.02.04`

#### Expected behaviour

Bulk-submitting local tx just mines them in dev chain (block

#### Actual behaviour

Stuck on 17th tx with an error, on which it hangs. Logs are:

```
...
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:06.075] local tx propagated                      tx_hash=67bcf4934f13cccf4fb5d49ca8e7760e8ac9dec914e7ccf56ff046d60f6e5245 announced to peers=0 broadcast to peers=0 baseFee=4794667
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:06.096] local tx propagated                      tx_hash=78e173cbe20ff6aedefddeb02f77074b60430aa920540d58818a4044691ffeeb announced to peers=0 broadcast to peers=0 baseFee=4794667
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:06.117] local tx propagated                      tx_hash=c835bab0f3b1a5286ce9a4790538f69f9d84d3c4b2ac08f914bd84a92558a939 announced to peers=0 broadcast to peers=0 baseFee=4794667
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:06.139] local tx propagated                      tx_hash=505f65df3fb6fe2c3490d77b9cbd41102565792675fbcdaa16074f18d208caba announced to peers=0 broadcast to peers=0 baseFee=4794667
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:06.432] RequestQueueTime (header) ticked 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:06.432] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:06.432] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:07.433] RequestQueueTime (header) ticked 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:07.433] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:07.433] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:08.434] RequestQueueTime (header) ticked 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:08.434] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:08.434] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:09.381] [1/16 Headers] Processed                 highest inserted=0 age=53y2w1d
[WARN] [04-13|12:15:09.381] mining                                   err="[1/5 MiningCreateBlock] decode rlp of pending txs: EOF"
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.382] Translation disabled. Enable by adding `tevm` to --experiments 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.382] [13/16 TxLookup] Extraction finished     took=73.2µs
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.382] [13/16 TxLookup] ETL Load done           bucket=BlockTransactionLookup records=0 alloc="8.9 MiB" sys="28.6 MiB"
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.382] [13/16 TxLookup] Load finished           took=158.5µs
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.382] TxPool disabled.  
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.382] Prune...                                 stage=Finish
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=TxLookup
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=LogIndex
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=StorageHistoryIndex
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=AccountHistoryIndex
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=CallTraces
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=HashState
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=IntermediateHashes
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=Execution
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=Senders
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.383] Prune...                                 stage=Bodies
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.384] Prune...                                 stage=BlockHashes
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.384] Prune...                                 stage=Headers
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:09.384] RPC Daemon notified of new headers       from=39 to=0
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:09.384] [1/16 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=39
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.384] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:09.384] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:10.385] RequestQueueTime (header) ticked 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:10.385] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:10.385] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:11.385] RequestQueueTime (header) ticked 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:11.385] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:11.385] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:12.338] RequestQueueTime (header) ticked 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:12.338] Empty anchor queue 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:12.338] Request skeleton                         anchors=0 top seen height=0 highestInDb=39
[INFO] [04-13|12:15:13.334] [1/16 Headers] Processed                 highest inserted=0 age=53y2w1d
[WARN] [04-13|12:15:13.334] mining                                   err="[1/5 MiningCreateBlock] decode rlp of pending txs: EOF"
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:13.335] Translation disabled. Enable by adding `tevm` to --experiments 
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:13.336] [13/16 TxLookup] Extraction finished     took=15µs
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:13.336] [13/16 TxLookup] ETL Load done           bucket=BlockTransactionLookup records=0 alloc="9.0 MiB" sys="28.6 MiB"
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:13.336] [13/16 TxLookup] Load finished           took=224.5µs
[TRACE] [04-13|12:15:13.336] TxPool disabled.
...
(same error repeats)
```

The RPC error for the 17th tx is

```
rpc error: code = Internal desc = discard reason: 11
```

Couldn't full-text search this in code but not an expert


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Don't have a minimal reproducible example but in a test suite runs this in a loop:
1. get next nonce with `eth_getTransactionCount`
2. use the nonce to build+sign+broadcast a simple tx (no tx.data, just transferring some wei)

The 17th tx is getting rejected. 

Erigon node is running with

```
erigon
       --datadir "$DATADIR" \
        --chain dev \
        --private.api.addr "localhost:9090" \
        --mine \
        --dev.period 2 \
        --verbosity 5 \
        --networkid 8995 \
        --txpool.pricelimit 10000 \
        --allow-insecure-unlock \
        --discovery.dns "" 
```

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

1. first 16 txs are not mined by some reason (small fee, or something else)
2. `discard reason: 11` - yes, we must print more user-friendly error. `Spammer             DiscardReason = 11`. See `--txpool.accountslots` 
3. EOF - yes, we need to fix this
4. `TxPool disabled.` - I think this is root of problem - need to investigate
I think EOF were fixed in some later versions. Can you try more new release of Erigon?

Will do, thanks.

@AskAlexSharov Does `--txpool.acountslots` apply across all accounts and txs? We'd like to have no limits for local tx - is that currently possible with Erigon? Kindof a dealbreaker for us if not
Just increase it. But notice that other nodes in network will not increase it.
Wouldn't we also increase it for accounts that are not local? What are the guarantees around accepting local tx if the account slots are full or any other txpool limit is reached?
Yes. Probably we don’t have —txpool.* flag to mark account as local.
Using `v2022.04.01` with bumped `--txpool.accountslots` value fixed the issue - thanks!

Thanks will do. Is the `accountslots` for all accounts and all txs? We'd like not have a limit for local txs
________________________________

Subject: Re: [ledgerwatch/erigon] Error: decode rlp of pending txs: EOF (Issue #3881)


I think EOF were fixed in some later versions. Can you try more new release of Erigon?
